Client.logic

Class GameFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • Client.logic.GameFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GameFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    The main frame of the offline game which shows the map , tanks , bullets and other components . Handles the rendering of the game and is updated 30 times per second . Reads a random map from maps directory and shows it on the frame .
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • printMap

        public void printMap(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Prints the map of the game by using graphics 2d and drawLine method . Each wall is considered as a line and breakable walls and simple walls are distinguished by their colors .
        Parameters:
        g2d -
